verbs.description: Despite [ARG1: the thousands of people] [R-ARG1: who] [V: died] [ARGM-TMP: during and after Hurricane Maria] , Trump and Pence are proud of FEMA .
[ARGM-ADV: Despite the thousands of people who died during and after Hurricane Maria] , [ARG1: Trump and Pence] [V: are] [ARG2: proud of FEMA] .
